author: nordbjerg
content:
It seems we split off and are now unable to connect to anyone on the devnet over this block: https://dora.pectra-devnet-4.ethpandaops.io/slot/16215

Specifically the tx `0x72a5918bd6708cd867e387c3fff8741ff60d51afc4b6997701df6a79d2c86c99` contains an auth item with `v = 15`, which afaik should not be allowed, I thought we only allow `v` as 0 or 1? or do we really support the entire range in `u8`

author: karalabe
content: Can I haz some rlp dump of the tx?

author: karalabe
content:
Are you by any change operating on 32 bit uint chain ids?

The id for the devnet is https://github.com/ethpandaops/pectra-devnets/blob/master/network-configs/devnet-4/metadata/genesis.json#L3C16-L3C26, which `x35` for the signature would overflos a uint32
